overview: Adam joined Practice Fusion in April 2010. He leads the account management team and is responsible for usage of Practice Fusion’s EHR product. Prior to joining Practice Fusion, Adam worked with Alliance Consulting Group and Deloitte Consulting LLP to lead adoption efforts for Customer Relationship Management and Electronic Medical Records systems. His clients included Gilead Sciences, Hewlett-Packard, Kaiser Permanente, Novartis, PacifiCare, Providence Health & Services and Symantec Corporation. He also led a corporate entrepreneurship workshop in Stanford School of Engineering’s Executive Education program. Adam holds a master’s degree in organizational behavior from Stanford University and a bachelor’s degree in economics from Dartmouth College.

relationships.title: Associate Vice President of Customer Engagement
